changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE maintenance_history ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, id_maintenance INTEGER NOT NULL, id_origin_employee INTEGER NOT NULL, id_destination_employee INTEGER NOT NULL, redirect_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, reason VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (id_maintenance) REFERENCES maintenance(id), FOREIGN KEY (id_origin_employee) REFERENCES employee(id), FOREIGN KEY (id_destination_employee) REFERENCES employee(id) );
